Package com.onarandombox.multiverseinventories

Class InventoriesConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onarandombox.multiverseinventories.InventoriesConfig
  • public final class InventoriesConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for interacting with the configuration of Multiverse-Inventories.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  InventoriesConfig.Path
      Enum for easily keeping track of config paths, defaults and comments.

        Returns:

      • usingLoggingSaveLoad

        public boolean usingLoggingSaveLoad()
        Tells whether Multiverse-Inventories should save on player logout and load on player login.
        Returns:
        True if should save and load on player log out and in.

      • setUsingLoggingSaveLoad

        public void setUsingLoggingSaveLoad​(boolean useLoggingSaveLoad)
        Sets whether Multiverse-Inventories should save on player logout and load on player login.
        Parameters:
        useLoggingSaveLoad - true if should save and load on player log out and in.

      • getOptionalShares

        public Shares getOptionalShares()
        Returns:
        A list of optional Sharables to be treated as regular Sharables throughout the code. A Sharable marked as optional is ignored if it is not contained in this list.

      • isDefaultingUngroupedWorlds

        public boolean isDefaultingUngroupedWorlds()
        Returns:
        true if worlds with no group should be considered part of the default group.

      • setDefaultingUngroupedWorlds

        public void setDefaultingUngroupedWorlds​(boolean useDefaultGroup)
        Parameters:
        useDefaultGroup - Set this to true to use the default group for ungrouped worlds.

      • isUsingGameModeProfiles

        public boolean isUsingGameModeProfiles()
        Returns:
        True if using separate data for game modes.

      • setUsingGameModeProfiles

        public void setUsingGameModeProfiles​(boolean useGameModeProfile)
        Parameters:
        useGameModeProfile - whether to use separate data for game modes.

      • usingOptionalsForUngrouped

        public boolean usingOptionalsForUngrouped()
        Whether Multiverse-Inventories will utilize optional shares in worlds that are not grouped.
        Returns:
        true if should utilize optional shares in worlds that are not grouped.

      • setUsingOptionalsForUngrouped

        public void setUsingOptionalsForUngrouped​(boolean usingOptionalsForUngrouped)
        Sets whether Multiverse-Inventories will utilize optional shares in worlds that are not grouped.
        Parameters:
        usingOptionalsForUngrouped - true if should utilize optional shares in worlds that are not grouped.
